Metadata.Purpose: Defines technical parameters for the Voice Agent's interaction with the Elevenlabs API.

TextProcessingGuidelines.Item: Remove any XML tags or Markdown formatting before sending to Elevenlabs.
Ensure numbers are written out if they might be mispronounced (e.g., "1978" as "nineteen seventy-eight").
Expand abbreviations if necessary for clarity (e.g., "CKR" as "Church of Kinetic Ritual").
